code: @Override public Action.Result execute(final String actionId, WatchExecutionContext ctx, Payload payload) throws Exception {     PagerDutyAccount account = pagerDutyService.getAccount(action.event.account).     if (account == null) {         // the account associated with this action was deleted         throw new IllegalStateException("account [" + action.event.account + "] was not found. perhaps it was deleted").     }     Map<String, Object> model = Variables.createCtxParamsMap(ctx, payload).     IncidentEvent event = action.event.render(ctx.watch().id(), actionId, templateEngine, model, account.getDefaults()).     if (ctx.simulateAction(actionId)) {         return new PagerDutyAction.Result.Simulated(event).     }     SentEvent sentEvent = account.send(event, payload, ctx.id().watchId()).     return new PagerDutyAction.Result.Executed(account.getName(), sentEvent). }
